EmailTemplate.name: 201908_Operator_Webinar_JetWave_TM.201908_Operator_Webinar_JetWave_Invite1_TM
EmailTemplate.subject: Upcoming Customer Webinar: Catch The JetWave
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
<[[https://aerospace.honeywell.com/]]>
Date August 29, 2019
Time 8:00 AM PST 11:00 AM EST
Hosted By: Jim Skvarla Senior Technical Sales Manager - Connectivity Products
Join our upcoming customer webinar, Catch the JetWave: An overview of JetWave, GoDirect Services and Inmarsat’s Global Express Network on Thursday, August 29 at 8:00 AM PST / 11:00 AM EST. Join Jim Skvarla, Senior Technical Sales Manager – Connectivity Products, as he covers the latest JetWave product and services information and Arno Vanderkraan, Senior Director - Global Channel Sales at Inmarsat who will cover the Inmarsat global network and their roadmap for the future. This one-hour event is one you won't want to miss! Sign up today!
CLICK HERE TO RSVP <[[https://honeywell.zoom.us/webinar/register/WN_DLaS0dp6SVmtNgxbD8wnuQ]]>
This webinar is intended for current and prospective Honeywell customers only, but please feel free to distribute to other members of your organization as you see fit. If this email was forwarded to you and you'd like to be notified about upcoming webinar events directly, please click here <[[https://pages3.honeywell.com/Subscription_Page.html]]> to let us know!
